text: Châtillon-sur-Lison is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. On 1 January 2022, it became a part of the commune of Cussey-sur-Lison.Arrêté préfectoral, 14 December 2021 == References == Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Châtillon-sur-Lison
